name: Forges of Aetheria
description:
Description
My entry for the 10 day LÖVE Game Jam 2023! It's a dungeon crawling auto battler focused on crafting equipment. Built using  LÖVE 11.4.

Check out books in the game for instructions on how to play.

Keys
Mouse = most everything
Keys 0-4 = adjust battle speed

Credits
Icons: game-icons.net
Fonts: Libre Baskerville by Impallari Type, Morris Roman by Dieter Steffmann, Raleway by Matt McInerney, Pablo Impallari, Rodrigo Fuenzalida
Music by Alkakrab

Notes
Contains ready made assets from game-icons.net as well as public domain music by the awesome Alkakrab. Also using library code I've written before the start of the jam. Wanted to prototype this game idea I've had for a while and felt that LÖVE Game Jam 2023 would be a good opportunity to do so. Of course, I noticed too late that the jam disallows public assets, but had fun working on this and don't really care about winning anything so I'm publishing this as is.
